text: I only saw one string left (<https://translate.rx.studio/translate/r-project/stats-r/ca/?offset=1&q=state%3Atranslated+without+any+variables&sort_by=-priority%2Cposition&checksum=#history|https://translate.rx.studio/translate/r-project/stats-r/ca/?offset=1&q=state%3Atransla[…]ithout+any+variables&sort_by=-priority%2Cposition&checksum=>) under `Waiting for review` with mine being the last edit, I tried reverting the change and setting it as a Suggestion instead.
